text: Payena is a genus of plants in the family Sapotaceae described as a genus in 1844.Candolle, Alphonse Louis Pierre Pyramus de. 1844. Prodromus Systematis Naturalis Regni Vegetabilis 8: 196-197 in LatinTropicos, Payena A. DC. Payena is native to Southeast Asia.Kew World Checklist of Selected Plant FamiliesGovaerts, R., Frodin, D.G. & Pennington, D. (2001 publ. 2002). World Checklist and Bibliography of Sapotaceae: 1-364. The Board of Trustees of the Royal Botanic Gardens, Kew. ;Species ==References== Category:Sapotaceae genera Category:Trees of Indo-China Category:Trees of Malesia Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
